title: The 10 items you don't actually need to pack for business travel
text:
It's very easy to overpack your carry-on or checked luggage, especially when you're traveling for business. Should you bring extra clothing, especially when you are dressing to impress potential clients (and perhaps impress attendants so you can get upgraded during your travels)? Or should you keep it professional yet simple, and instead focus on your work?

Whether you're a seasoned traveler or a newbie, knowing how to pack smartly can make your travels easier. There are plenty of articles that tell business travelers what to pack but not many that will tell you the honest truth — you don't need most of the stuff they suggest.

Here are a few items you may want to think twice about packing.
description: Overpacking can slow you down and be a burden (literally). Here's what to avoid bringing for your next trip.
